definitions.definition: To render sexual , or apply sex appeal to (a person, thing, or concept ).
examples: Your advertising doesn't need to sexualize goods and services to sell them to me, and in fact I might make a point of not buying your product if you pester me with sexualization.

definitions.definition: To distinguish as belonging to separate sexes.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To render sexual , or apply sex appeal to (a person, thing, or concept ).
secondary_definitions: ( biology , transitive ) To distinguish as belonging to separate sexes.
